title: Linzer Sandwich Biscuits
ingredients: ['For the Biscuits', '4 hard-boiled egg yolks', '80g caster sugar', '200g butter', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '1 pinch salt', '300g plain flour', '2 egg yolks, beaten', 'For the Almond Sugar', '120g blanched almonds, coarsely chopped', '100g caster sugar', 'For the Filling', '125g redcurrant jelly', 'For Dusting', '40g caster sugar']
